result.explanation: Invalid or missing ‘mdui:Description’ and/or ‘mdui:DisplayName’ under ‘md:SPSSODescriptor/md:Extensions/mdui:UIInfo’ in language with code ‘en’, or display name (= ‘CLARIN services’) length (= 15) < 5 or > 33, or description (= ‘Various services provided by the Leibniz-Institut für Deutsche Sprache (IDS) in the context of the CLARIN initiative.’) length (= 117) < 20 or > 100.
result.requirement: Partially a requirement for DFN-AAI registration. Partially a requirement for the GÉANT Data Protection Code of Conduct Entity Category. Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation.
Completely a guideline for the CLARIN Service Provider Federation. See: http://docs.oasis-open.org/security/saml/Post2.0/sstc-request-initiation.html .
